title: Report: Meta’s over $799 Cambria AR/VR headset described as ‘Chromebook for the face’
content:
Meta has been teasing Project Cambria as a high-end mixed reality headset for some time now, and a new report describes it as a “Chromebook for the face.”

more…

The post Report: Meta’s over $799 Cambria AR/VR headset described as ‘Chromebook for the face’ appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Meta has been teasing Cambria as a high-end headset for some time now, and a new report describes it as a "Chromebook for the face."
